prepare data for JAGs

Source: R/prep_data.r
prep_data.Rd

prepare data for JAGs

Usage

prep_data(
  dataframe,
  biomarker_column = get_biomarker_names_var(dataframe),
  verbose = FALSE
)

Arguments

dataframe

a data.frame containing ...

biomarker_column

character string indicating which column contains antigen-isotype names

verbose

whether to produce verbose messaging

Value

a prepped_jags_data object (a list with extra attributes ...)

Examples

set.seed(1)
raw_data <-
  serocalculator::typhoid_curves_nostrat_100 |>
  sim_case_data(n = 5)
prepped_data <- prep_data(raw_data)
